note: Nathan Rambukkana (he/him) is an internet researcher (20+ years), sexuality & intimacy scholar (longer), and unabashed nerdy weirdo (longer still). Work | Wilfrid Laurier, Canada. Books | Fraught Intimacies: Non/Monogamy in the Public Sphere. Ed. of Hashtag Publics: The Power and Politics of Discursive Networks & Intersectional Automations: Robots, AI, Algorithms and Equity. I'm currently working on an 2nd monograph called Digital Intimacies: How Platforms Remake Close Connections that Matter.
